description: This roasted eggplant recipe with herby lentil couscous and tahini dressing is vibrant, flavoursome and filling. It'll become your new go-to meat-free dish.
keywords: Roasted Eggplant With Herby Lentil Couscous And Tahini Dressing
name: Roasted Eggplant With Herby Lentil Couscous And Tahini Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tahini, garlic, remaining lemon juice and 1/4 cup of water in a small bowl. Spoon couscous mixture onto each eggplant and drizzle with tahini dressing. Serve.
